// Warning: this file is generated!
// Modifying it by hand it useless at best, and sabotage at worst.


/*
 * language's metadata:
 *     name:    library
 *     version: 1
 */


import {DynamicNode} from "@lionweb/core";


export type Book = DynamicNode & {
    classifier: "Book";
    settings: {
        title: string;
        pages: number;
        author: Writer;
        type?: unknown;
    };
};

enum BookType {
    Normal, Special
}

export type GuideBookWriter = DynamicNode & {
    classifier: "GuideBookWriter";
    settings: {
        countries: string;
    };
};

export type Library = DynamicNode & {
    classifier: "Library";
    settings: {
        name: string;
        books: Book[];
    };
};

export type SpecialistBookWriter = DynamicNode & {
    classifier: "SpecialistBookWriter";
    settings: {
        subject: string;
    };
};

export type Writer = DynamicNode & {
    classifier: "Writer";
    settings: {
        name: string;
    };
};
